text: Liu Gang (born 19 March 1984) is a Chinese sport shooter. He participated at the 2018 ISSF World Shooting Championships, winning a medal.50 m team rifle prone results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Chinese male sport shooters Category:ISSF rifle shooters Category:Sport shooters from Shenyang Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Shooters at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Shooters at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games
title: Liu Gang (sport shooter)
